messages.ssml: <speak>It is not certain how long the virus that causes <sub alias="covid 19">COVID-19</sub> survives on surfaces. Studies suggest that coronaviruses may persist on surfaces for a few hours or up to several days. This varies depending on different conditions such as the type of surface, temperature or humidity of the environment.</speak>

messages.speech: It is not certain how long the virus that causes COVID-19 survives on surfaces. Studies suggest that coronaviruses may persist on surfaces for a few hours or up to several days. This varies depending on different conditions such as the type of surface, temperature or humidity of the environment.
